messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the serpent people's ability in terms of life forms?
manipulate life forms as they desired
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can the serpent people adjust the genetic structure of a creature before birth?
yes, they could adjust the genetic structure of a creature in its prenatal state
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What were the serpent people able to create?
both ghasts and the voormis are their creations
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What transformations could the serpent people create using their serums?
the most remarkable transformations in fully grown specimens
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can the serpent people do to a creature's genetic structure?
They can adjust the genetic structure of a creature in its prenatal state.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can the serpent people create poisons that induce sleep?
Yes, some of their poisons simply induce sleep.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can the serpent people develop serums for remarkable transformations?
Yes, they developed serums which could evoke the most remarkable transformations in fully grown specimens.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is notable about the serpent people's knowledge of poisons?
No other race has come close to approaching the level of knowledge of poisons enjoyed by the serpent people.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How did some serpent people's knowledge of poisons manifest?
Some were blatantly obvious—causing fear, while others were incredibly subtle.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When did the later Hyperborean civilization of the serpent people fall?
The later Hyperborean civilization of the serpent people, which preserved many of the secrets of Yoth, fell almost a million years ago
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is unique about the location where Star Stones of Mnar are usually found?
They are usually found in the same location as the supposed tombs of ancient evil beings.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a characteristic of Star Stones of Mnar?
They are best described as green-colored disk-shaped (sometimes star-shaped) rocks
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What civilization had knowledge of poisons similar to that of the serpent people?
No other race has come close to approaching the level of knowledge of poisons enjoyed by the serpent people.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a star stone believed to ward against?
the minions of the Great Old Ones
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where are star stones usually found?
in the same location as the supposed tombs of ancient evil beings
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if a star stone is removed from its proper place?
the bearer will suffer an elder curse
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is believed to ward the bearer against the minions of the Great Old Ones?
A star stone
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who are the inventors of the Stasis Cube?
Yithians
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the primary purpose of the Stasis Cube?
To slow the flow of time
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the expected advancement in the Stasis Cube by the Yithians in the future?
1-second internal time per million years external time
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why do the Elder Gods supposedly not want the stones to be removed from the Great Old Ones' prison-tombs?
Because doing so might weaken the magicks in force and allow the imprisoned god to break free.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the primary purpose of the Stasis Cube?
To slow the flow of time.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the purpose of the smallest stasis cubes used in Pnakotus?
To store books.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the material most stasis cubes are made from?
Metal or plastic.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the primary function of the smallest stasis cubes?
The smallest stasis cubes were used to store books in Pnakotus.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How were the stasis cubes typically activated?
Pushing a button or opening up the stasis cube deactivates most stasis cubes.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the name of the city in the Australian desert constructed by the Great Race a million years ago?
The city is called Pnakotus, which scholars believe translates to 'city of archives'.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is unique about the stasis cubes that require complicated panels to activate?
Some stasis cubes have complicated panels allowing the programming of set periods of stasis.
